BREAKING: Google made an AI for sign language.

You "translate" sign language with AI:

1. Go to "SignGemma Google".
2. Sign up on their Google form.
3. Access it before others once it's live.

Why this changes everything:
☑ Devs can bake accessibility into every app.
☑ Any laptop camera becomes a free interpreter.
☑ "ASL → English" today. Any language tomorrow.
